module.title: At vero eos et accusamus
module.html:
Construction projects are usually very complex and involve many parties, as well as large amounts of money. Whether you are an owner, contractor, designer, engineer or material supplier, Horowitz Law Group will focus on protecting your interests in a construction project or dispute.

After carefully reviewing your case, our attorneys come up with a sound legal strategy on how to avoid and/or resolve your legal construction dispute. With years of experience in Construction litigation, we have handled many cases on:

  • preparation of agreements with architects, general contractors and construction managers, including bidding and contract negotiation
  • stop notices, non-performance during construction
  • construction defects
  • sales disputes
  • private & governmental projects
  • insurance coverage

Call us at (212) 920-4503 or email at jhorowitz@horowitzpllc.com to schedule a consultation today.
